questions.question: What Is Sound?
questions.answer: How we sense changes in Atmospheric Pressure.

questions.question: What do we hear when we hear a sting vibrate?
questions.answer: The air molecules moving around - back and forth.

questions.question: What is Compression?
questions.answer: A peak of high pressure.  When the string of a musical instrument pushes air molecules to create sound.

questions.question: What is Rarefaction?
questions.answer: A trough of low pressure.  When the string of a musical instrument pulls air molecules to create sound.

questions.question: What is created when there is a repetition of compression and rarefaction?
How Can We Visualize Sound Waves?
questions.answer: Plot change in air pressure against time.

questions.question: Name two key aspects of sound?
What Is RMS?
questions.answer: Root Mean Square - helps determine the average amplitude of a single.

questions.question: What Is Frequency?
questions.answer: How many cycles of peaks and troughs in a second.
